TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SchemaImporterExtension extends System.Object

summary.span: 可以讓您在使用自動查詢工具時，自訂 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件所產生的程式碼。

span.span: Allows you to customize the code generated from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document when using automated query tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當透過 [加入 Web 參考] 對話方塊之類的工具產生的 Web 服務 proxy，就會發生結構描述匯入作業中找到在 Visual Studio 中，或使用[Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)。Schema importation occurs whenever a Web service proxy is produced through a tool such as the Add Web Reference dialog box found in Visual Studio, or by using the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88). 使用時，也會發生結構描述匯入[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)從特定的 XSD 文件產生程式碼。Schema importation also occurs when using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) to generate code from a specific XSD document. 類別可讓您修改時使用任何一種工具，產生的程式碼。The class allows you to modify the code generated when using any of these tools. 比方說，您可能有現有的類別，處理程序活頁簿訂單在系統上，而且您有現有的 XSD 文件，提供您的訂單。For example, you may have an existing class that processes book orders on a system and you have an existing XSD document that supplies your orders. 使用類別，您可以讓其中一個工具來產生程式碼，會使用您的類別。Using the class, you can enable one of the tools to generate code that uses your class. 若要控制的程式碼產生，您必須使用中的類別命名空間。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)並[CodeDOM 快速參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx). 若要讓 WSDL.exe 工具 （其接著會使用其他工具，例如 [加入 Web 參考] 對話方塊中） 使用您的延伸模組的步驟如下：The steps to enabling the WSDL.exe tool (which in turn is used by other tools such as the Add Web Reference dialog box) to use your extension are: 1. 建立實作類別。Create an implementation of the class. 2. 使用方法來撰寫程式碼產生器的程式碼。Use the method to write code for the code generator. 此方法包含參數，可讓您檢查攔截的 XSD 型別，並建立用來產生新的 CLR 程式碼的 CodeDOM 物件。The method contains parameters that allow you to examine the intercepted XSD type and create CodeDOM objects that are used to generate the new CLR code. 3. 如有需要，使用方法以處理\ XSD 文件中找到的項目。If required, use the method to handle \ elements found in the XSD document. 4. 如有需要，使用XSD 文件中找到方法來檢查預設值，並傳回不同的預設值。If required, use the method to examine default values found in the XSD document and return a different default value. 5. 編譯您的延伸模組程式庫。Compile your extension into a library. 6. 簽署組件。Sign the assembly. 7. 組件安裝在全域組件快取 (GAC) 中。Install the assembly in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC). 8. 修改 machine.config 檔案，以包含擴充功能。Modify the machine.config file to include the extension. ## Examples 請參閱[SchemaImporterExtension 技術範例](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample.md)。See the [SchemaImporterExtension Technology Sample](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample.md). 請注意，此範例不包含已簽署的組件。Note that this example does not include a signed assembly. 相反地，它會示範如何使用命令視窗。Instead, it demonstrates how to use the with a command window.

param.name: any

span.span: An that represents the element found in the XML Schema Document (XSD).

param.span: ，指出 XSD 屬性是否已設為 "mixed"。

span.span: A that indicates whether the XSD attribute has been set to "mixed".

param.span: 如果屬性已設為 mixed 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the attribute has been set to mixed, otherwise .

param.name: schemas
param.span: ，包含 XSD 中的結構描述集合。

span.span: An that contains the collection of schemas found in the XSD.

param.name: importer
param.span: ，正在使用的匯入工具。

span.span: The that is the importer being used.

param.name: compileUnit
param.span: ，可以將 CodeDOM 結構加入其中，為 XSD 產生替代程式碼。

param.name: mainNamespace
param.span: ，表示項目的目前命名空間。

param.name: codeProvider

summary.span: 處理結構描述中 <xsd:any> 項目的匯入。

span.span: Handles the importation of the <xsd:any> elements in the schema.

returns.span: 項目對應至的 CLR 型別名稱。

span.span: The name of the CLR type that the element maps to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制的程式碼產生，您必須使用中的類別命名空間。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)並[CodeDOM 快速參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制的程式碼產生，您必須使用中的類別命名空間。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)並[CodeDOM 快速參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).

summary.span: 可讓您藉由檢視匯入的結構描述以及指定其所對應的 CLR 型別，管理產生的程式碼。

span.span: Allows you to manipulate the code generated by examining the imported schema and specifying the CLR type that it maps to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示的簡單實作方法。The example below shows a simple implementation of the method. 程式碼會檢查命名空間和名稱。The code checks the namespace and name. 當找不到正確的值時，它會在產生的程式碼中新增的自訂組件 (「 Order.dll") 必須參考的名稱。When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code. 接著，它會加入新的命名空間 ("Microsoft.Samples 」) 所產生程式碼中。It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code. [!code-csharp[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/CS/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/VB/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 可讓您藉由檢視匯入的結構描述以及指定其所對應的 CLR 型別，管理產生的程式碼。

span.span: Allows you to manipulate the code generated by examining the imported schema and specifying the CLR type that it maps to.

returns.span: 它對應至的 CLR 型別名稱。

span.span: The name of the CLR type that this maps to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示的簡單實作方法。The example below shows a simple implementation of the method. 程式碼會檢查命名空間和名稱。The code checks the namespace and name. 當找不到正確的值時，它會在產生的程式碼中新增的自訂組件 (「 Order.dll") 必須參考的名稱。When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code. 接著，它會加入新的命名空間 ("Microsoft.Samples 」) 所產生程式碼中。It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code. [!code-csharp[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/CS/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/VB/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.vb#1)]
